short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to create your own menu on any site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions allows you to create menu of links per domain/website. Saved links are visible ONLY on page you saved it. Right click on any link you want to save in the box visible in left bottom corner.

Extension can:
- add new urls to the list by right click and "Fast menu -> Add to menu"
- delete saved links by right click and "Fast menu -> remove from menu"
- clear ALL saved urls by clicking rightclick anywhere and "Clear saved urls"

Everything is stored on extension side, no data send to any server - everything is happening locally.
